verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> The burden דְבַר־ <WH1697> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> to Israel בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by מַלְאָכִֽי׃ <WH4401> Malachi

אָהַ֤בְתִּי <WH157> I have loved אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Yet ye say יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> say בַּמָּ֣ה <WH4100> How אֲהַבְתָּ֑נוּ <WH157> Wherein hast thou loved הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not אָ֨ח <WH251> another עֵשָׂ֤ו <WH6215> us? [Was] not Esau לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> Jacob's נְאֻם־ <WH5002> you saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וָאֹהַ֖ב <WH157> yet I loved אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> Jacob

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> Esau שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <WH8130> And I hated וָאָשִׂ֤ים <WH7760> and laid אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָיו֙ <WH2022> his mountains שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> waste וְאֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> and his heritage לְתַנּ֥וֹת <WH8568> for the dragons מִדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of the wilderness

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Though תֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> saith אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> Whereas Edom רֻשַּׁ֗שְׁנוּ <WH7567> We are impoverished וְנָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> but we will return וְנִבְנֶ֣ה <WH1129> and build חֳרָב֔וֹת <WH2723> the desolate places כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> They יִבְנ֖וּ <WH1129> They shall build וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶהֱר֑וֹס <WH2040> but I will throw down וְקָרְא֤וּ <WH7121> and they shall call לָהֶם֙ גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> them The border רִשְׁעָ֔ה <WH7564> of wickedness וְהָעָ֛ם <WH5971> and The people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom זָעַ֥ם <WH2194> hath indignation יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against whom the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> And your eyes תִּרְאֶ֑ינָה <WH7200> shall see וְאַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> and you תֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and ye shall say יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> will be magnified יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and לִגְב֥וּל <WH1366> from the border יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בֵּ֛ן <WH1121> A son יְכַבֵּ֥ד <WH3513> honoureth אָ֖ב <WH1> [his] father וְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> and a servant אֲדֹנָ֑יו <WH113> his master וְאִם־ <WH518> if אָ֣ב <WH1> if then I [be] a father אָ֣נִי <WH589> I אַיֵּ֣ה <WH346> where כְבוֹדִ֡י <WH3519> glorious וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֲדוֹנִ֣ים <WH113> master אָנִי֩ <WH589> I אַיֵּ֨ה <WH346> where מוֹרָאִ֜י <WH4172> dread אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> And ye say יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לָכֶם֙ הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> unto you O priests בּוֹזֵ֣י <WH959> that despise שְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> my name וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> say בַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> How בָזִ֖ינוּ <WH959> Wherein have we despised אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> my name

מַגִּישִׁ֤ים <WH5066> Ye offer עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon מִזְבְּחִי֙ <WH4196> upon mine altar לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread מְגֹאָ֔ל <WH1351> polluted וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> and ye say בַּמֶּ֣ה <WH4100> How גֵֽאַלְנ֑וּךָ <WH1351> Wherein have we polluted בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֕ם <WH559> thee? In that ye say שֻׁלְחַ֥ן <WH7979> The table יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִבְזֶ֥ה <WH959> [is] contemptible הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> when תַגִּשׁ֨וּן <WH5066> And if ye offer עִוֵּ֤ר <WH5787> the blind לִזְבֹּ֙חַ֙ <WH2076> for sacrifice אֵ֣ין <WH369> else רָ֔ע <WH7451> adversity וְכִ֥י <WH3588> when תַגִּ֛ישׁוּ <WH5066> present פִּסֵּ֥חַ <WH6455> the lame וְחֹלֶ֖ה <WH2470> and sick אֵ֣ין <WH369> else רָ֑ע <WH7451> adversity הַקְרִיבֵ֨הוּ <WH7126> approach נָ֜א <WH4994> thy לְפֶחָתֶ֗ךָ <WH6346> it now unto thy governor הֲיִרְצְךָ֙ <WH7521> will he be pleased א֚וֹ <WH176> Or הֲיִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> with thee or accept פָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> accept אָמַ֖ר <WH559> answer יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now חַלּוּ־ <WH2470> entreat נָ֥א <WH4994> I beseech thee פְנֵי־ <WH6440> favor אֵ֖ל <WH410> God וִֽיחָנֵ֑נוּ <WH2603> that he will be gracious מִיֶּדְכֶם֙ <WH3027> unto us this hath been by your means הָ֣יְתָה <WH1961> become זֹּ֔את <WH2063> will he הֲיִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> will he regard מִכֶּם֙ <WH4480> any פָּנִ֔ים <WH6440> favor אָמַ֖ר <WH559> answer יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

מִ֤י <WH4310> Oh גַם־ <WH1571> again בָּכֶם֙ וְיִסְגֹּ֣ר <WH5462> Who [is there] even among you that would shut דְּלָתַ֔יִם <WH1817> the doors וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תָאִ֥ירוּ <WH215> [for nought]? neither do ye kindle מִזְבְּחִ֖י <WH4196> [fire] on mine altar חִנָּ֑ם <WH2600> for nought אֵֽין־ <WH369> else לִ֨י חֵ֜פֶץ <WH2656> I have no pleasure בָּכֶ֗ם אָמַר֙ <WH559> in you saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> an offering לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor אֶרְצֶ֥ה <WH7521> neither will I accept מִיֶּדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> at your hand

כִּ֣י <WH3588> from מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> For from the rising שֶׁ֜מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun וְעַד־ <WH5704> even מְבוֹא֗וֹ <WH3996> even unto the going down גָּד֤וֹל <WH1419> [shall be] great שְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> of the same my name בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the Gentiles וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> every מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> and in every place מֻקְטָ֥ר <WH6999> incense מֻגָּ֛שׁ <WH5066> [shall be] offered לִשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> unto my name וּמִנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> offering טְהוֹרָ֑ה <WH2889> and a pure כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָד֤וֹל <WH1419> [shall be] great שְׁמִי֙ <WH8034> for my name בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you מְחַלְּלִ֣ים <WH2490> But ye have profaned אוֹת֑וֹ <WH853> בֶּאֱמָרְכֶ֗ם <WH559> it in that ye say שֻׁלְחַ֤ן <WH7979> The table אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> of the Lord מְגֹאָ֣ל <WH1351> [is] polluted ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְנִיב֖וֹ <WH5108> and the fruit נִבְזֶ֥ה <WH959> [is] contemptible אָכְלֽוֹ׃ <WH400> thereof [even] his meat

וַאֲמַרְתֶּם֩ <WH559> Ye said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold מַתְּלָאָ֜ה <WH4972> also Behold what a weariness וְהִפַּחְתֶּ֣ם <WH5301> [is it] and ye have snuffed אוֹת֗וֹ <WH853> אָמַר֙ <WH559> at it saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <WH935> and ye brought גָּז֗וּל <WH1497> [that which was] torn וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפִּסֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH6455> and the lame וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣חוֹלֶ֔ה <WH2470> and the sick וַהֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <WH935> thus ye brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> an offering הַאֶרְצֶ֥ה <WH7521> should I accept אוֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> מִיֶּדְכֶ֖ם <WH3027> able אָמַ֥ר <WH559> say יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וְאָר֣וּר <WH779> But cursed נוֹכֵ֗ל <WH5230> [be] the deceiver וְיֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> which בְּעֶדְרוֹ֙ <WH5739> hath in his flock זָכָ֔ר <WH2145> a male וְנֹדֵ֛ר <WH5087> and voweth וְזֹבֵ֥חַ <WH2076> and sacrificeth מָשְׁחָ֖ת <WH7843> a corrupt thing לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <WH136> unto the Lord כִּי֩ <WH3588> for מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> King גָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> for I [am] a great אָ֗נִי <WH589> I אָמַר֙ <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> and my name נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> [is] dreadful בַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the heathen
